instructions.title: How To Delete Your OkCupid Account
instructions.before: You can Delete your Account from any device. Itâ€™s important to note that if you delete your OkCupid Account the deletion cannot be undone.  If you think you want to return in the future go through the steps and use the disable option.

qnAnswers.question: What happens if I delete my account?
qnAnswers.answer: You will lose your information and not be able to get it back. However, if you  decide you want a new account, you will be able to use the same email address to start a new OkCupid Account.

qnAnswers.question: What happens if I disable my account?
qnAnswers.answer: If you disable your account you will still be able to get all your old information, pictures, and messages back if you want in the future.  Your account will appear deleted but it will be reactivated and all the data will be recovered when you log back in.

thingsToRemember: If you choose the Delete option, you will loose your information and not be able to get it back.
However, if you do Delete your account, and then decide you want a new account, you will be able to use the same email address to start a new OkCupid Account
If you disable your account you will still be able to get all your old information, pictures, and messages back if you want in the future.
Disabling your account is the same as deleting the account.  Essentially, your account will appear deleted but it will be reactivated and all the data will be recovered if you log back in.

steps: Next you will receive a message asking what you can do to make OkCupid better
Swipe Left when asked if you joined to see who is available
Swipe Left when asked if you want to browse your matches and try again
Now you can choose Disable or Delete. To continue with Deletion choose Delete Account

slides.title: Delete Account

slides.alt: OkCupid-Delete Account from iOS. Step 11: Tap Confirm to finalize deletion
slides.title: Confirm

steps: [Go to the OkCupid Website](https://www.okcupid.com). If you're already logged in, doing so will open your OkCupid home page
Click the Profile Icon and Click Settings
Scroll Down and Click Go Here to Disable Account
Click Delete Account to continue Deletion or Disable Account to Pause your Account
Choose a Reason for Deletion then Click Delete
